subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
Part of an {{der|zh|aav}} word family; compare {{cog|km|tr=-rāṃṅa|t=to be light; to be bright}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}), from {{cog|mkh-pro|*raaŋʔ||light; to shine}}; as well as:
:* {{m|km|ស្រាំង||to be pale; to be colourless}} with {{och-l|爽}}, 
:* {{m|km|tr=brāṅa|t=to grow light (after dark)}} with {{och-l|炳}}.
:* {{m|km|tr=paṃbrāṅa|t=to shed a pale light}} with {{och-l|明}}.
